author: wrowe
msg: Roll away the SSL_EXPERIMENTAL_ENGINE test in favor of testing for the
ENGINE_init() function in config.m4, and rely on HAVE_ENGINE_INIT instead.

author: wrowe
msg: First point out that we lost HAVE_SSL_SET_STATE and HAVE_SSL_SET_CERT_STORE

author: stas
msg: get rid of Apache::TestTrace's dependency on Apache::TestConfig as it
creates too many circular use() problems.

author: nd
msg: - uris were partially not correctly escaped (in particular:
- not all uri schemes contain an authority component (//)
- don't add a query string (and drop r->args) if it's not
Reviewed by: Justin Erenkrantz, Brian Pane
